description.narrative: Increase in marketed output among project beneficiaries in Lesotho's smallholder agriculture sector and, to improve the Recipient's capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an Eligible Crisis or Emergency.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article IV, 4.01 (a) | Description :The Co-financing agreement has been executed and delivered, and allconditions precedent to its effectiveness or to the right of the Recipient to make withdrawals under it have been fulfilled | DueDate :14-Feb-2012
Finance Agreement :Article IV, 4.01 (b) | Description :The Recipient has adopted the Project Implementation Manual in form andsubstance satisfactory to the Association | Due Date :14-Feb-2012

Finance Agreement :Article IV, 4.01 (c) | Description :The Recipient has adopted a Financial Management System for the Project,including the deployment of off-the-shelf accounting software | Due Date :14-Feb-2012
Finance Agreement :Article IV, 4.01 (d) | Description :The Recipient has submitted the Annual Work Plan and Budget for 2012/13 |Due Date :14-Feb-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IV, B.1 (b) | Description :No withdrawals shall be made under Cat. 3 until the Recipientshall have provided evidence, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association, that the Sub-Grant Committee has beenestablished | Due Date :30-Apr-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V | Description :The Recipient shall provide to the Association for its prior review andapproval the first 30 sub-project proposals recommended under Sub-comp 1.1, and the first 20 AIPs prepared under Sub-comp 2.1 | DueDate :30-Nov-2013
